title: Issues Annotating Keypoints
body:
From User Slack Chat: 

> When I tried to annotate some random video, I got one problem. I annotated first frame and passed same annotations to another frames as shown in pictures. When I shift point in 2nd frame, it moves randomly. Even right and left clicks are not able to make point stable at the location I want. It is moving alot. I tried many times to do it but same. As you see in last picture point 2
![image (9)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6606958/168617426-43257a99-1efd-468d-a67a-3be6144fca67.png)
![image (8)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6606958/168617433-d908b8ff-8c5c-4587-a9a0-31c4669241bb.png)
![image (7)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6606958/168617440-4d0dc699-7cc9-4d0e-a848-05a6151c9bc0.png)

![image (5)](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6606958/168617453-0a546c0b-cb44-4f20-876b-18cdd3c84c07.png)
